content: *updated version 1b includes a note on jogless colourwork photo sample of the candystripe pattern and a new houndstooth pattern with photo easy knitted colourwork scrunchies made in the round great stash buster this pattern is knitted as a tube and closed up with a hairtie in the middle to create a scrunchie pattern includes two different methods of closing up the scrunchie along with four charts to choose from you are more than welcome to adjust this pattern to suit any other designs you can come up with gauge 31 stitches per 10 cm in stockingnette the row gauge is unimportant needles 3 25 mm short shank needles i use a 3 0 mm in my left hand so stitches fly off easily 16 inch 40 cm cable if you have any questions please feel free to reach out to me on instagram always happy to yarn about yarn copyright this pattern including the wording and the photos are my own work
